sts row 7 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row row 56 sl1 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row row 8 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row row 57 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to last st in row k1 row 9 k1 sl1wyif 2 times kfb 2 times *k1 sl1wyif row 58 sl1 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row repeat from * to end of row 12 sts row 59 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to last st in row row 10 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row kfb 14 sts row 11 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row row 60 sl1wyif sl1wyib *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to row 12 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row end of row row 13-28 repeat row 9-12 four more times 20 row 61 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row sts row 62 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row row 29-32 work in linen st pattern 63-84 repeat row 55-62 three more times 20 sts row 33 k1 sl1wyif 2 times k2tog 2 times *k1 total sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row 18 sts row 85 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row row 34 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row row 86 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row row 35 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row row 87-96 repeat row 85 and 86 five more times row 36 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row bind off row 37-56 repeat row 33-36 five more times 8 sts finishing row 57-60 repeat row 35 and 36 two times repeat row 5-56 bind off lay the loops piece face down on a flat surface fold the cast on edge and the bound off edge in to center to meet center tie each other using a length of yarn and a tapestry needle co 8 sew those two edges together weave in any ends to work in linen st for 26 row conceal them bind off fold the tails piece in half longer corners towards the center tails place the loops on top of the tails co 20 wrap the center tie around the loops and tails it will be a row 1 *k1 sl1wyif repeat from * to end of row tight fit using tapestry needle and a length of yarn sew row 2 *p1 sl1wyib repeat from * to end of row the cast on edge of the center tie to the bound off edge row 3-12 repeat row 1 and 2 five more times adjust
